Me in a Nutshell

Jiri is currently a Research Assistant at the Software Engineering & Testing Using Artificial Intelligence for Reliable Software (STAIRS) lab within the ICS department at UC Irvine. He works with Prof. Iftekhar Ahmed in Department of Donald Bren School of Information and Computer Sciences in University of California, Irvine


His main research interests are Software Engineering for Machine Learning (SE4ML), Machine Learning for Software Engineering (ML4SE), Natural Language Analysis, Mutation Analysis, and Program Analysis.
